Class ec.ifc.stonelook.SLComboBox 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.View
           |
           +----ec.ifc.app.ECComboBox
                   |
                   +----ec.ifc.stonelook.SLComboBox
public class SLComboBox
extends ECComboBox
implements HasColorScheme
Subclass of ECComboBox that applies the stone-texture look

SLComboBox()
returns an SLComboBox with bounds 0,0,0,0
SLComboBox(int, int, int, int)
returns an SLComboBox with the specified bounds

createBorder()
Overridden to create an SLBezelBorder
createDropButton()
Overridden to create a stone-look-style marble button.
createListView()
Overridden to create an SLListView.
createScrollGroup()
Overridden to create an SLScrollGroup.
createTextField()
Overridden to create a borderless SLTextField.
getColorScheme()
Returns the color scheme for the combo box -- one of the set specified by class StoneLook.
setColorScheme(int)
Sets the color scheme for the combo box.

SLComboBox 
  public SLComboBox()
returns an SLComboBox with bounds 0,0,0,0
SLComboBox 
  public SLComboBox(int x,
                    int y,
                    int width,
                    int height)
returns an SLComboBox with the specified bounds

createBorder 
  protected Border createBorder()
Overridden to create an SLBezelBorder

createDropButton 
  protected Button createDropButton()
Overridden to create a stone-look-style marble button.

Overridden to create an SLListView.

Overridden to create an SLScrollGroup.

createTextField 
  protected TextField createTextField()
Overridden to create a borderless SLTextField.
Overrides:
createTextField in class ECComboBox
getColorScheme 
  public int getColorScheme()
Returns the color scheme for the combo box -- one of the set specified by class StoneLook. The default is StoneLook.BLUES.
setColorScheme 
  public void setColorScheme(int newColorScheme)
Sets the color scheme for the combo box.
